column3: The  Court is  vested with  a  duty  under  section 68  inquire  in to  the

column4: the  date  of  filing  of  the

column2: information  and  to  protect  his  possession  until  the  matter  is  adjudicated
before  a  competent  court.  The  only  exception  is  where  a  dispossession
has  taken  place  within  two  months  from  filing  the  information.  It has

column1: been  held  in  the  case  of Ramalingam  V.  Thangarajah  [1982]  2  Sri  L  R
